00021 #pragma once
00022 
00023 #include <l4/sys/capability>
00024 #include <l4/sys/irq>
00025 #include <l4/re/dataspace>
00026 #include <l4/re/event.h>
00027 
00028 namespace L4Re {
00029 
00036 typedef l4re_event_stream_id_t Event_stream_id;
00037 typedef l4re_event_stream_info_t Event_stream_info;
00038 typedef l4re_event_absinfo_t Event_absinfo;
00039 
00044 class L4_EXPORT Event :
00045   public L4::Kobject_t<Event, L4::Icu, L4Re::Protocol::Event>
00046 {
00047   L4_KOBJECT(Event)
00048 public:
00056   long get_buffer(L4::Cap<Dataspace> ds) const throw();
00057   long get_num_streams() const throw();
00058   long get_stream_info(int idx, Event_stream_info *info) const throw();
00059   long get_stream_info_for_id(l4_umword_t stream_id, Event_stream_info *info) const throw();
00060   long get_axis_info(l4_umword_t stream_id, unsigned naxes, unsigned *axis,
00061                      Event_absinfo *info) const throw();
00062 };
00063 
00064 struct L4_EXPORT Default_event_payload
00065 {
00066   unsigned short type;    
00067   unsigned short code;    
00068   int value;              
00069   l4_umword_t stream_id;  
00070 };
00071 
00072 
00077 template< typename PAYLOAD = Default_event_payload >
00078 class L4_EXPORT Event_buffer_t
00079 {
00080 public:
00081 
00085   struct Event
00086   {
00087     long long time;         
00088     PAYLOAD payload;
00089 
00093     void free() throw() { l4_mb(); time = 0; }
00094   };
00095 
00096 private:
00097   Event *_current;
00098   Event *_begin;
00099   Event const *_end;
00100 
00101   void inc() throw()
00102   {
00103     ++_current;
00104     if (_current == _end)
00105       _current = _begin;
00106   }
00107 
00108 public:
00109 
00110   Event_buffer_t() : _current(0), _begin(0), _end(0) {}
00111 
00118   Event_buffer_t(void *buffer, l4_addr_t size)
00119     : _current((Event*)buffer), _begin(_current),
00120       _end(_begin + size / sizeof(Event))
00121   {}
00122 
00128   Event *next() throw()
00129   {
00130     Event *c = _current;
00131     if (c->time)
00132       {
00133         inc();
00134         return c;
00135       }
00136     return 0;
00137   }
00138 
00145   bool put(Event const &ev) throw()
00146   {
00147     Event *c = _current;
00148     if (c->time)
00149       return false;
00150 
00151     inc();
00152     c->payload = ev.payload;
00153     l4_wmb();
00154     c->time = ev.time;
00155     return true;
00156   }
00157 };
00158 
00159 typedef Event_buffer_t<Default_event_payload> Event_buffer;
00160 
00161 }
